places.name: Park Güell
places.description: Park Güell is a famous public park with colorful mosaics and architectural elements designed by Antoni Gaudí.

places.name: La Boqueria Market
places.description: La Boqueria is a vibrant food market in Barcelona, offering a variety of fresh produce, meats, and local cuisine.

places.name: Sagrada Família
places.description: Sagrada Família is an iconic basilica designed by Antoni Gaudí, known for its intricate architecture and ongoing construction.

places.name: Louvre Museum
places.description: The Louvre is one of the world's largest and most famous art museums, housing a diverse collection of artworks.

places.name: Eiffel Tower
places.description: The Eiffel Tower is a symbol of Paris and offers breathtaking views of the city from its observation decks.

places.name: Montmartre
places.description: Montmartre is a historic neighborhood known for its artistic heritage, charming streets, and the Sacré-Cœur Basilica.
